name: prendus-question-elements
description: Fully embeddable custom HTML elements for Prendus questions.

scripts.test: npm run link && electron --enable-logging node_modules/scram-engine/main.js --entry-file test/index.html --auto-run
scripts.test-window: npm run link && electron --enable-logging node_modules/scram-engine/main.js --entry-file test/index.html --window
scripts.link: rm -rf node_modules/prendus-question-elements && npm link && npm link prendus-question-elements
scripts.build-for-production: tsc --module ES2015 --target ES2015 --outDir dist || echo done && webpack dist/prendus-question-elements/prendus-view-question.js dist/prendus-view-question.js && webpack dist/prendus-question-elements/prendus-edit-question.js dist/prendus-edit-question.js && node rewrite-ts-to-js.js && cp navbar-logo-black.png dist/navbar-logo-black.png

author: Jordan Last <jordan.michael.last@gmail.com>
